this game works in windows vista and 7 and xp 64 bit and as well as 32 bit

http://gameinfocenter.com/pc-games/system-requirements/Need-for-Speed-Carbon.html

Minimum system requirements

OS: Windows 2000 SP4 / Windows XP SP2
CPU: 1.7 GHz
RAM: 512 MB RAM
Hard Disk: 4.7 GB
Optical Drive: 8x DVD/CD
Video Card: 64 MB memory and one of these chipsets is required: NVIDIA GeForce3 / NVIDIA GeForce4 (Ti series only) / ATI Radeon 8500
Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Online Multiplayer: 512 Kbps connection; 2-8 Players
Input: Keyboard, Mouse
Optional: USB Steering Wheel / Dual Analogue Gamepad

if the game not works then download this files http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5029864#filelistContainer then right click on shortcut of nfs then find target in xp and open file location in 7 and copy the all files

No matter what I try, I cannot get Need For Speed Carbon Collectors Edition to run.  I keep getting the error message: NFSC.exe  entry point not found, The procedure entry point D3DXVec3Transform could not be located in the dynamic link library d3dx9_30.dll.  This was my last time trying.
